Custom made exceptions for handling errors in a more simple and concise manner.

Application level exceptions, provides useful handling and information for all the different user interactions.

Plant level exceptions, all the base interactions of a User with it's owned plants.

Provides constant values in enumeration classes and different items that help with the handling of Plants.

com.glamdring.greenZenith.externals.database.constants

com.glamdring.greenZenith.handlers.locations

com.glamdring.greenZenith.userInteractions
Contains different logic classes that realize all the interactions that a User can make.
